sections.heading: Act, how cited.Sections 76-2001 to 76-2008 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act
76-2001 to 76-2008 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act.
sections.text: 76-2001 to 76-2008 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act.
